ygData.subject: Re: Question about multiple characters
ygData.msgSnippet: I play Fiera on Xegony, and I have a Ogre on the PvP server and one on another server, can t remember which right now... but I spend most of my time on Fiera,
ygData.messageBody:
I play Fiera on Xegony, and I have a Ogre on the PvP server and one on
another server, can't remember which right now... but I spend most of my
time on Fiera, just to try to keep up with my guild... although I'm falling
badly behind, I still enjoy playing him.

Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
.
----- Original Message -----
From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail) <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 5:21 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Question about multiple characters


> From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
> How many of you are playing multiple characters at the same time?
> I played first a dark elf necro up to level 16..
> my main character is now an enchanter level 20..I've been playing her a
lot
> but since Saturday ( which is when I leveled ) I havent been fighting at
> all, I'm in one of those travelling / meeting people mood.
> Anyway, this morning I started a bard...I dont why ...I completely gave up
> my necro when I started to play my enchanter. I dont want to do that this
> time, but sometimes I get bored and I need something new...
>
> Skara de Toxxulia
>
>
